params.roleSourceType: Determines which DID role to validate.  - 1: Manufacturer DID  - 4: Government DID

updateLifecycleStatus(bytes32,uint8,byte.details: Accepts a lifecycle status defined as: 0 - Original 1 - Repurposed 2 - Reused 3 - Remanufactured 4 - Waste

updateBatteryPassport(uint256,bytes32,by.notice: Updates the entire Battery Passport information.

updateCarbonFootprint(uint256,bytes32,by.notice: Updates the carbon footprint data of the battery passport.

updateLifecycleStatus(bytes32,uint8,byte.notice: Updates the lifecycle status of the battery passport.

updateMaterialAndDueDiligence(uint256,by.notice: Updates material composition and due diligence data.
